abstract: Simona Halep defeats Karolina Pliskova to win Dubai Championships tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Halep earned her second title of the year by beating 17th-seeded Karolina Pliskova, 6-4, 7-6 (4), in the Dubai Championships final in the United Arab Emirates.

headline.main: Simona Halep Wins Second Title of the Season
headline.print_headline: Halep Wins a Second Title With a Victory in Dubai

snippet: The top-seeded Halep earned her second title of the year by beating 17th-seeded Karolina Pliskova, 6-4, 7-6 (4), in the Dubai Championships final in the United Arab Emirates.
